question: What is the name of the Royal Anthem of Canada?
possible_answers: C. God Save the Queen (or King)
main_question: What is the name of the Royal Anthem of Canada?
answer: C. God Save the Queen (or King)
explanatory_sentence: The Royal Anthem of Canada, “God Save the Queen (or King),” can be played or sung on any occasion when Canadians wish to honour the Sovereign.
